 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂלִק‎</span>] **verb** ==kindle, burn== ([[Eccl.43.4|Eccl 43:4]] margin <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִסִּיק‎</span>, v[[Neh.7.21|Neh 7:21]] v[[Neh.7.23|Neh 7:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשִּׂיק‎</span>, ***burn***; Aramaic (also BA) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְלַק‎</span> ***ascend***, Aph\`el ***cause to go up*** (in flame), offer sacrifice; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סלק‎</span> ***ascend***); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵשׁ נִשְּׂקָה בְיַעֲקֹב‎</span> [[Ps.78.21|Ps 78:21]] ***a fire was kindled against Jacob.*** **Hiph\`il** ***make a fire burn: Perfect*** 3 plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִשִּׂיקוּ‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of thing; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשִּׂיק‎</span> [[Isa.44.15|Isa 44:15]] (both \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּעֵר‎</span>).
